response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to your needs and desires, is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,400,000. This exclusive offer reflects my confidence in its quality and relevance to your requirements, and I believe it represents an excellent investment for you. Please consider this proposal carefully, and let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 1400000}
